titleStmt.title: A catalogue of sins highly useful to self-acquaintance, experimental prayer; and above all to a suitable preparation, for a worthy partaking of the supper of the Lord. With a preface exciting to an examination of our selves, and shewing the use and benefit of all these. By John Woodhouse.
titleStmt.author: Woodhouse, John, d. 1700.
